name: Custom House Capital
overview:
Custom House Capital Limited is one of Irelandâ€™s leading independent wealth managers providing investment services and retirement planning services to high net worth individuals. Our highly experienced and professional team is committed to growing and protecting client wealth through dedicated financial planning services.

Our range of investment options allows clients to grow their wealth and / or their pension fund in a progressive yet secure manner.

Custom House Capital Limited offers investors access to a wide variety of exciting investment opportunities across all asset classes, including equities, bonds, structured products, cash and European property funds.
